PropertyIterator Deprecated. The DAML API is scheduled to be removed from Jena 2.6 onwards.
 

Package com.hp.hpl.jena.ontology.daml Description

A re-implementation of the Jena 1.X DAML+OIL API, to assist Jena 1 users to move to Jena2. Now re-implemented using the generic OntModel capabilities. With effect from Jena release 2.5, this DAML-specific API is deprecated; with effect from Jena release 2.6 it will be removed. Users who still make use of this API should switch their code to use the main ontology API with the DAML.OIL profile. E.g: replace DAMLClass with OntClass, in an OntModel defined with a DAML_OILProfile.
